description: Converts a datatable to a CSV string.

input.name: data
input.description: An object containing columns and rows.

input.name: separator
input.description:
Character used as column delimiter.
Defaults to `,`.

input.name: newline
input.description:
Character used as row delimiter.
Defaults to `\n` (newline).

input.name: columns
input.description:
A list of columns to be included in the CSV text.
Defaults to `null` (all columns).

input.name: filename
input.description:
The name of the output file.
Defaults to `data.csv`.

output.name: csv
output.description: A text file in CSV format.
